named-query.name: File.getFileByDownloadHash
named-query.query: select file from File file join fetch file.creator where file.downloadHash=:downloadHash

named-query.name: File.deleteFile
named-query.query: delete from File file where file.deleteHash=:deleteHash and file.creator.nickName=:creatorNickName

named-query.name: File.findByDeleteHash
named-query.query: select file from File file where file.deleteHash=:deleteHash

named-query.name: File.getSharedFilesForUser
named-query.query: select file from File file left outer join fetch file.sharedWithUsers swu where swu.nickName=:userNickName and file.fileType = ftp.core.common.model.File$FileType.SHARED

named-query.name: File.getPrivateFilesForUser
named-query.query: select file from File file left join file.creator crtr where crtr.nickName=:userNickName and file.fileType = ftp.core.common.model.File$FileType.PRIVATE

named-query.name: File.getSharedFilesWithUsers
named-query.query: select fls from User usr left outer join usr.uploadedFiles fls where fls.fileType = ftp.core.common.model.File$FileType.SHARED and usr.id=:userId
